channel.title: DragonFire X server devolpment
channel.description:
[URL=http://www.mybannermaker.com][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Av2O6.png[/img][/URL]
[center]~~DragonFire X~~[/center]
welcome to the DragonFire X server devolpment. I was always coding server but i never maded one my self to host. So i decided to make one. I will host it but it will be hamachi untill i get some donators to get vps.
server & client base used: server: evolutionX v5 client: evolutionX v5
what i gonna do. ~ i will rewrite the skills. so i will make my own skills and add my own xp so it will get a little harder to get a skill to 99. it will become skill and pk server. I'm tired of seeing that people play like an hour and got almost all skills on 99.
~ i will add some commands. only a few that will be needed for the server.
~ I will slow down the combat so the server will not be full of 126's.
~ Adding some area's.
~ Making economy better and make making money a little bit slow down so it will be harder to get items.
~ adding skill tabs
19/06 ~started on the skill tabs ~went on holiday 25/06 ~camed back from holiday ~started on herblore 26/06 ~continue on finishing herblore. also checking out if the xp rate is good. ~started on a place for 126's that they can slay monsters. you only can get there if u got a combatlevel of 126. You need to go to the champions guild to get there, pics and vids will come soon. ~finished the herblore only need to test the xp rate. 27/06 ~started on crafting 28/06 ~continue on crafting ~started at home area 29/06 ~continue on crafting and home area (pics of home will come soon) ~found bug, bones on altar trying to fix 30/06 ~continued on home area ~still fixing the bug ~added godsword hilts with blades 31/06 ~started on fletching ~ continued crafting 01/07 ~continued on fletching and crafting. 02/07 ~finished fletching ~continued on crafting ~continued on home area pics/video's:
[URL=http://nl.tinypic.com/r/1051bgg/3]View My Video[/URL]
That's all for now i will keep updating this. (pics will come soon) thanks for looking to this devolpment,
halflive9

item.title: DragonFire X server devolpment
item.dc:creator: @halflive9 halflive9
item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

                    [URL=http://www.mybannermaker.com][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Av2O6.png[/img][/URL]

[center]DragonFire X[/center]

welcome to the DragonFire X server devolpment.
I was always coding server but i never maded one my self to host.
So i decided to make one. I will host it but it will be hamachi untill i get some donators to get vps.

server & client base used:
server: evolutionX v5
client: evolutionX v5

what i gonna do.
~ i will rewrite the skills. so i will make my own skills and add my own xp so it will get a little harder to get a skill to 99. it will become skill and pk server. I’m tired of seeing that people play like an hour and got almost all skills on 99.

~ i will add some commands. only a few that will be needed for the server.

~ I will slow down the combat so the server will not be full of 126’s.

~ Adding some area’s.

~ Making economy better and make making money a little bit slow down so it will be harder to get items.

~ adding skill tabs

19/06
~started on the skill tabs
~went on holiday
25/06
~camed back from holiday
~started on herblore
26/06
~continue on finishing herblore. also checking out if the xp rate is good.
~started on a place for 126’s that they can slay monsters. you only can get there if u got a combatlevel of 126. You need to go to the champions guild to get there, pics and vids will come soon.
~finished the herblore only need to test the xp rate.
27/06
~started on crafting
28/06
~continue on crafting
~started at home area
29/06
~continue on crafting and home area (pics of home will come soon)
~found bug, bones on altar trying to fix
30/06
~continued on home area
~still fixing the bug
~added godsword hilts with blades
31/06
~started on fletching
~ continued crafting
01/07
~continued on fletching and crafting.
02/07
~finished fletching
~continued on crafting
~continued on home area
pics/video’s:

View My Video

That’s all for now i will keep updating this. (pics will come soon)
thanks for looking to this devolpment,

halflive9

Read full topic
